oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: F. Woods Beckman and LeRoy P. Graf correspondence with public school principals in Knox County, Tennessee, 1956 March 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Beckman, F. Woods; Graf, LeRoy P.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter authored by F. Woods Beckman, state chairman of the Tennessee Council on Human Relations, and LeRoy P. Graf, president of the Fellowship House of Knoxville, announcing a 3 day workshop on school integration based on the successful desegregation program implemented in Knoxville and Knox County, Tennessee.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Segregation in education -- Tennessee -- Knoxville
Fellowship House of Knoxville (Knoxville, Tenn.); Tennessee Council on Human Relations
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Chattanooga Board of Education correspondence and memoranda, 1955-1957
Chattanooga Board of Education records and correspondence, 1953-1961
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Raymond B. Witt Chattanooga Public Schools desegregation records
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:rightsHolder: Beckman, F. Woods; Graf, LeRoy P.
